plot: Former Bahraini pearl divers, the men on their Arab dhow, and the women on the shore, reenact traditional pearl diving songs.
title: Bahrain Ambient Film: Men and Women Singing
plot_es: Former Bahraini pearl divers, the men on their Arab dhow, and the women on the shore, reenact traditional pearl diving songs.
original_name: Bahrain Ambient Film: Men and Women Singing
plot_en: Former Bahraini pearl divers, the men on their Arab dhow, and the women on the shore, reenact traditional pearl diving songs.
